string.name: pref_cat_general
string.comment: name of the general preference category

string.name: pref_cat_sync
string.comment: title of the sync preferences category

resources.string: Izmantot teksta ievades lauku kartītē, lai ierakstītu atbildi
Atiestatīt valodas piešķīrumus (teksta pārvēršanai runā vārdnīcām) visām kavām
Kartīšu pārlūkā attēlot informācijas nesēju datņu nosaukumus jautājumu/atbilžu laukos
Paslēpt sistēmas joslas un atbilžu pogas
Piešķirt kustības noteiktām darbībām, piemēram, kartīšu atbildēšanai vai labošanai.
Open navigation drawer when swiped right from anywhere on the screen

string.name: gestures_none
string.comment: No gestures

resources.string: Double the scroll gap with eReader
Reads out question and answer if no sound file is included
Sync automatically on app start/exit if the last sync was more than 10 minutes ago.

string.name: sync_media_always
string.comment: Option to always fetch media when syncing

resources.string: Change the sync icon when changes can be uploaded
If disabled, you will be warned if you try to sync on a metered connection
Aparatūras atveidotājs ir ātrāks, bet tam var būt sarežģījumi, it īpaši ar Android 8/8.1. Šis iestatījums jāmēģina, ja kartīšu nav redzamas atsevišķas kartīšu izskatīšanas saskarnes daļas.
Atspējot visas animācijas un izmantot drošāku kartīšu attēlošanas veidu. Tas var būt nepieciešams e-tintes ierīcēs.
Ļauj \"Satura paslēpšana\" konteksta izvēlni, kad tiek izmantots guleniskais novietojums.
Otrais atbilžu pogu piesitiens netiks ņemts vērā, ja nebūs aizritējis šis laiks. Tas novērš nejaušus divkāršos piesitienus
Mazākais piespiešanas laiks, pirms poga \"Parādīt atbildi\" pieņem pieskārienu.
Show next review time on answer buttons
Rādīt kartīšu skaitu, atbildes laika skaitītāju, karogu un iezīmi augšējā joslā

plurals.name: day_offset_summ
plurals.comment: %d is going to be replaced with the number of hours past midnight. It can be replaced if something else suits better the translation

resources.string: Ļaut citām lietotnēm savienoties ar AnkiDroid un lasīt/rakstīt datus bez Tavas iejaukšanāš
Pielāgot, kuras darbības ir redzamas lietotnes joslā
Apskatīt sarakstu ar lietotnēm, kas izmanto AnkiDroid API, piemēram, vārdnīcas, palīglietotnes.

string.name: pref_controls_reviews_tab
string.comment: Name of the tab to configure controls for the reviews screen

string.name: pref_controls_previews_tab
string.comment: Name of the tab to configure controls for the previews screen

string.name: toggle_backside_only
string.comment: Control setting that toggles \'Backside only\' in the previews screen

resources.string: Press back twice to go back/exit
To avoid accidentally leaving the reviewer or the app
Allow all files in media imports
If Android doesn’t recognize a media file

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_none_of_the_two_servers_used
string.comment: This summary is shown when neither of the two custom sync servers are used, which is the default.

resources.string: As an alternative to synchronizing with AnkiWeb, you may use your own server for synchronization. If not set, the default AnkiWeb server will be used instead. Learn more

string.name: card
string.comment: Generic term to refer to a card

string.name: deck_conf_general
string.comment: Label of the submenu for the general options of new deck

string.name: deck_conf_cram_search
string.comment: Label of a text field that contains a search query.

string.name: deck_conf_cram_reschedule
string.comment: Title of the box labelled by deck_conf_cram_reschedule_summ

resources.string: Pārplānot kartītes, vadoties pēc manām atbildēm šajā kavā
Aizkaves ir sekundēs. 0 atgriež kartīti sākotnējā kavā.
Tu vari sniegt savu ieguldījumu AnkiDroid, palīdzot izstrādes komandai redzēt, kuras iespējas cilvēki izmanto

Piezīmju redaktorā pārveidot jebkuru
par pāreju uz jaunu rindu, kad tiek labota kartīte.
Automatically focus the ‘type in answer’ field in the reviewer
Šie ir mūsu lieliskie līdzdalībnieki. Tu arī vari palīdzēt Ankidroid ar programmēšanu, tulkošanu, ziedojumiem un vēl.
AnkiDroid ir laista klajā ar GPL-3.0 un AGPL-3.0 licencēm, un pirmkods ir pieejams GitHub
AnkiDroid also uses third-party libraries and icons, which are licensed under various open source licenses
AnkiDroid izstrādi var atbalstīt ar ziedošanu. Jebkāds daudzums tiks ļoti novērtēts.
Trigger JavaScript from the review screen

string.name: display_binding_card_side_question
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the question

string.name: display_binding_card_side_answer
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the answer

string.name: display_binding_card_side_both
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to both the question and the answer

string.name: binding_remove_binding
string.comment: The parameter is the name of the key/gesture. Keys cannot be translated yet.

resources.string: AnkiDroid ir ieviesta labāks TTS (teksta pārvēršanas runā) mehānisms, kas ir saderīgs ar citiem Anki klientiem un iekļauj vairāk balsu un valodas atskaņošanas uzlabojumiem.\n\nLūgums atjaunināt, tiklīdz tas ir iespējams, jo šis iestatījums drīz tiks noņemts
Please upgrade to the new text to speech format

Please be sure before enabling developer options. These options are dangerous and could break the app or corrupt your collection.\n\nNote that these options are not suited for most users and therefore are not translated, so they are in English.

AnkiDroid laiku pa laikam veic krājumu rezerves kopēšanu Tiklīdz rezerves kopijas ir vecākas par vairāk kā divām dienām, AnkiDroid sāks noņemt dažas no tām, lai atbrīvuto krātuves vietu.

Jāņem vērāk, ka informācijas nesēju datnes netiek iekļautas rezerves kopijās. Drošības dēļ lūgums laiku pa laikam sinhronizēt savu krājumu vai saglabāt tā izguves.

Krājumu atjaunot no rezerves kopijas un izgūt var kavu saraksta izvēlnē.

string.name: pref__widget_text__error
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating a generic error. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__widget_text__calculating
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating that the value, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

plurals.name: pref__widget_text__n_files_n_bytes
plurals.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, showing some statistics about a folder on disk if a form of “12 files\n26 MB”. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Delete images and other media that are not prefixed with _ and are not referenced by any notes

string.name: dialog__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can select unused media files to delete

string.name: pref__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Preference title

string.name: dialog__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can choose backups to delete

string.name: pref__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Izdzēst krājumu, informācijas nesējus un rezerves kopijas. Lietotnes iestatījumi netiek izdzēsti

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. When the collection is deleted, we exit the process, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Vai tiešām izdzēst savu krājumu, informācijas nesējus un rezerves kopijas?\n\nPiezīme: šī darbība aizvērs logu.

string.name: pref__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Izdzēst krājumu, informācijas nesējus, rezerves kopijas un iestatījumus

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Vai tiešām izdzēst visus datus? Tiks izdzēsts Tavs krājums, informācijas nesēji, rezerves kopijas un iestatījumi.\n\nPiezīme: šī darbība aizvērs logu.

string.name: pref__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Izdzēst iestatījumus un citus lietotnes datus

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Vai tiešām izdzēst lietotnes datus? Tiks izdzēsti iestatījumi un citi lietotnes dati.\n\nPiezīme: šī darbība aizvērs logu.

string.name: pref__etc__summary__fetching
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when the value is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__summary__no_collection
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when a preference is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: pref__etc__summary__error
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when there was an error fetching the value. For example, this is shown when the permission to access collection is lacking

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__fetching
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__calculating
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__no_collection
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference that is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: hide_system_bars
string.comment: Title of a setting that allows to hide the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_none
string.comment: Setting option to not hide any of the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_status_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system status bar (the top one with clock, battery status, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_navigation_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system navigation bar (the bottom one that can go back, to home, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_all_bars
string.comment: Setting option to hide all the system bars

string.name: reviewer_frame_style_card
string.comment: Style name of the \'Card\' card frame of the Reviewer

string.name: reviewer_frame_style_box
string.comment: Style name of the \'Box\' card frame of the Reviewer

string.name: open_settings
string.comment: Description of the shortcut that opens the app settings
